SuperstitioMod:SexMarkOrb_Inside.NAME: Penetration: %s
DESCRIPTION: #yCollect #b%d #yof these: NL Generate and play a #yGangbang, dealing AoE damage. NL Adds #b%d #ydamage to the generated #yGangbang.

SuperstitioMod:SexMarkOrb_Outside.NAME: Semen Coating: %s
DESCRIPTION: #yCollect #b%d #yof these: NL Generate and play a #yGangbang, gaining *Semen-Stains. NL Adds #b%d #yBlock to the generated #yGangbang.
